snippet.title: Scribblequest Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD DEMO ON STEAM 🕹 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3210560/Scribblequest_Demo/
PLAY DEMO IN BROWSER 🌐 https://gx.games/games/01qfph/scribblequest/
Wishlist on Steam 🎉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1417870/Scribblequest/
Website 🎵 http://scribblequest.com/

Follow on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sprightlygames
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sprightlygames
Follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sprightlygames/
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/cgKvtAWnyh

Hey friendbuddy! My name is Scribble & this is my game, Scribblequest! It's a whimsical musical adventure. No, it's not just a game with music in it, it's like LITERALLY a musical. We sing songs with lyrics that tell the story while minigames pop in and out in time with the music. There's also a colorful world to explore and lots of lovable new friendbuddies to meet! If you're interested pretty please with a cherry on top wishlist the game on Steam, join the email list,  follow on Twitter and Instagram, and join our Discord. Thanks for checking out my game, see ya real soon!
